TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceContainer extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer, class System.IDisposable, class System.IServiceProvider
Public Class ServiceContainer Implements IDisposable, IServiceContainer

summary.span: 提供 接口的简单实现。

span.span: Provides a simple implementation of the interface.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象可以用于存储和提供服务。The object can be used to store and provide services. 实现 接口。 implements the interface. 可以使用添加父构造函数创建对象通过哪些服务可以根据需要添加到或从所有父级中移除对象，包括直接父。The object can be created using a constructor that adds a parent through which services can be optionally added to or removed from all parent objects, including the immediate parent . 若要添加或删除服务从所有链接至此的实现设置父级，通过调用或接受一个布尔值，该值指示是否以提升的服务请求的方法重载.To add or remove a service from all implementations that are linked to this through parenting, call the or method overload that accepts a Boolean value indicating whether to promote the service request. > [!NOTE] > 特性应用于此类具有以下属性值： 。The attribute applied to this class has the following property value: . 不影响桌面应用程序（通常通过双击图标、键入命令或在浏览器中输入 URL 来启动这些应用程序）。The does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser). 有关详细信息，请参阅类或[SQL Server 编程和宿主保护特性](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md)。For more information, see the class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md). ## Examples 下面的示例程序演示服务链接和由此产生的服务可用性的链链接对象。The following example program demonstrates service chaining and the resultant service availability of a chain of linked objects. 该程序提供一个用户界面，允许你查看链接的服务链中的服务的可用性，并使用， ，和方法，以及链接的服务容器。The program provides a user interface that allows you to see the availability of services within a chain of linked services, and uses the , , and methods as well as linked service containers. [!code-cpp[ServiceArchitectureExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ServiceArchitectureExample/CPP/serviceform.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ServiceArchitectureExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ServiceArchitectureExample/CS/serviceform.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceArchitectureExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ServiceArchitectureExample/VB/serviceform.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务容器使用此服务对象提供程序检索服务，如果它们不容器中的本地可用。The service container uses this service object provider to retrieve services, if they are not available locally in the container.

summary.span: 获取由 直接实现的默认服务。

span.span: Gets the default services implemented directly by .
The default services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回直接在此实现的默认服务。This property returns the default services that are implemented directly on this . 此属性的默认实现是返回和类型。the default implementation of this property is to return the and types. 你可能会重写此属性并返回您自己的类型，修改的默认行为。You may override this property and return your own types, modifying the default behavior of .

span.span: Disposes this service container.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Dispose ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
Public Sub Dispose ()
public: virtual void Dispose();

span.span: Disposes this service container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指导容器内的所有实例化的服务并释放任何实现，并清除服务列表。 walks all instantiated services within the container and disposes any that implement , and clears the service list. 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: virtual void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 如果 正在被释放的过程中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is in the process of being disposed of; otherwise, .
Disposes this service container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指导容器内的所有实例化的服务并释放任何实现，并清除服务列表。 walks all instantiated services within the container and disposes any that implement , and clears the service list. 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
